Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hey, I need a house if you could.][UnlockBuildingID:53]
[Text:You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?][Name:Collection]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.][Name:JoinPartyYes]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
